A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have seen every SW movie made in the theater\, everyone of them I went back to see at least once. I also own every one of them personally. This movie started great with Poe doing what Poe does. Then Leia \"Mary Poppins\" her way through space and a knot started to grow in my stomach. It didn't get any better from there\, Rey hands Luke his dad's lightsaber and he throws it away like trash. What??? That is a Skywalker heirloom\, at least keep it\, lock it up. They make Luke look like an doddering old fart\, Fin was misused\, Phasma was misused.  The only coherent plot was Kylo/Rey and it wasn't enough to save this movie. Han Solo dying I got\, I hated it but I got it. The main SW line is about the Skywalkers\, well now they don't exist anymore. Way to kill a franchise Rian Johnson\, this will be the first SW movie I don't see again in the theater or buy. Frankly I think Disney should scrap this movie\, sell it off as a dream or something and remake it. I would rate it no Stars\, but the music and CGI make me are least like the background stuff.
